reviews.review: Игра интересная нужно уметь логически думать делать несколько решений сразу, но в конце меня не очень удолетворило, было интересной, но не увидел кого-то из людей когда она вышла из лаболотории и только безкрайнее поле нужно было хотя бы сделать маленькую дорогу где приезжает к ней такси и она садится туда и уезжает в город наверно

look man all i'm saying is the bad guy was also british so
Ben bi oyunu bu kadar beğenebileceğimi hiç düşünmemiştim . Hikayenin hiç bitmemesini isterdim . Ayrıca IQ seviyemizi de yükseltebilecek bir oyun :D

Portal 2 is one of the most creative and well-thought games of all time. It lead to an innovation in co-op games which made it so special. The game is designed to be a fun cooperative experience however it lead to being one of the best games ever. Gameplay is perfect, it creates a new world of creativity and imagination of the players, which they need to figure out how to go on to the next stage. Portal 2 story's is a masterpiece. Who knew a puzzle co-op game with 2 robot friends could lead on to you being anxious to discovering what will really happen to these robots. It closes out perfect, however not leading to a continuation unfortunately. It deserves every cent and every second played as well. A masterpiece in not only puzzle games, but games in general. 10/10

Программа вечного тестирования была расширена для создания совместных головоломок для вас и ваших друзей! Игра очень крутая особенно если проходить с друзьями.
10/10

Oyun o kadar mükemmel ki o müziklerin bile verdiği gerilimi içinizde hissediyorsunuz. Yükseklik korkunuz da varsa eğer adrenalin hormonları tavan yapabiliyor. Bulmacalarıyla ve hikayesiyle kesinlikle harika. Almanızı öneririm 18,5 tl asla boşa gitmez.
oyun eğlenceli biraz iq gerektiriyo ama olsun ve patates bilgisayarda bile oynaya biliyorsun tavsiye ederim...
one of my all time favorite games
I think this might've been the best game I've ever played. It's six years old and it's still on a Godly Level of Quality.
this game is awsome! it has an awsome story and a challengeing game
Entretenido y desafiante, La historia es divertida, los personajes bien estructurados y un buen finalm lo recomiendo por el buen gameplay que ofrece y el desafio que opone.
Simplesmente genial, o Metacritic não exagerou na nota da versão do pc.

Played when first released and enjoyed it! Fast-forward a few years, and have been playing again and enjoying just as much the second time. This time I'm going to also try playing CO-OP with my son, who is now old enough to appreciate the problem solving and humor.

Portal es un muy buen  juego le he dedicado muchas horas en el modo un jugador, coperativo y en mapas creados por la comunidad como Into the Multiverse ademas me parece muy genial la forma en la que suena los portales
So good and so much fun, the map creation and sharing give infinite content to have fun with

Portal 2 is a phenomenal game that will always hold a place in my heart. It's packed with humorous dialogue, engaging mechanics, and lots of new puzzle features unique to the 2nd installment. The sudden events are done better and even 9 years after its release it still holds up to my expectations. Now we wait for Portal 3!

Игра хорошая, всем советую. Жаль только одно, что она ну уж слишком короткая. Игру можно пройти примерно за 3 часа. Игра забавная, скучно не будет. Я думаю Portal 2 очень прикольная игра с кучей отсылок и пасхалок)
Моя любимейшая игра из всех существовавших.
Very puzzling, but I do miss the advanced chambers from Portal 1...In case you couldn't guess, I don't want the same advanced chambers to be ported over.
un juegazo, la cancion de el final es muy buena y te hace llorar

[h1] The Best Game Created [/h1]
I mean it. The atmosphere, the story, the lore, the music, the writing all of it works so perfectly for Portal.
The universe they have created is something I haven't seen in a game with only two installments. Co-op mode is a blast to play with friends and mess around and gives good closure to the end of Portal 2
The modding scene is also insanely great. Portal Reloaded just came out a week ago and Portal Stories: Mel is also a great mod. It just goes to show that even after a whole 10 years of this game being out it still has held up as being one of the best games ever created. Please Consider getting Portal 2, and if you have already bought it before buy it again.

If you loved the original you will love this. The graphics have gotten an insane overhaul. The humor is hilarious and the villian is amazing. Just buy it on a sale since you can get it for suuuuuuper cheap.

First time playing ever and it is 2021. Still a great game so far. The dark humor and voice lines truly make the game much better than a normal puzzle game. I have not played co-op yet but the single player mode stil has been so much fun!

Portal 2 is legitimately the best game I have ever played. If you like single player, mind-bending, first person 3D puzzle platforming games, you've found the right game. Or if you like video games, you've found the right game.
I could play it a thousand times. Absolutely incredible. If you are still hesitating, BUY THE GAME. If you, for whatever strange reason, don't like the game, you can return it. But BUY THIS GAME. You will thank me.

Anyway have a nice day :)
it good ok look thats all i got i love this game and i dont know what else to say
What shall I say? GLaDOS is the Countess Dowager Violet Crawley of gaming.

Хорошее повествование и юмор который не раз заставлял улыбнуться. В игре всего лишь одна механика — порталы, но Valve сумели разнообразить её чтобы играть было интересно. Головоломки интересные и заставляют во время их прохождения поломать голову и буквально не понимать в какую сторону двигаться. А потом когда их проходишь и пересматриваешь удивляешься как грамотно благодаря огромным просторам комнат и однотонности уровня разработчики добились такого эффекта сложности и непонимания у игроков на довольно простых и линейных квестах.
Best puzzle game ever. We need more.
great... do i need to say anything else?
Amazing gameplay, great storyline and lovable characters! Even doing my project and dissertation on this game for final year of university, it was so good!
Mano um dos melhores jogos que já vi!!! uma continuação digna
